# ClipboardManager - macOS Clipboard History App

## Project Overview
A native macOS clipboard manager built with Swift and SwiftUI that provides unlimited clipboard history without payment restrictions.

## Features
- Unlimited clipboard history storage
- Support for text and images
- Menu bar integration
- Searchable history
- Clear history functionality
- Keyboard shortcuts
- Native SwiftUI interface
- Optimized for Apple Silicon (M2)

## Project Structure
- Swift/SwiftUI based macOS application
- Native menu bar app
- Local storage for clipboard history
- DMG packaging for distribution

## Build Target
- macOS 13.0+
- Apple Silicon (M2) optimized
